summary: "The Amazing Race" is an exciting TV show where teams of two people travel the world, solving clues and facing challenges. They use different transportation like planes, boats, and taxis, and they must manage a limited budget. Teams get eliminated along the way, and the first team to reach the final destination wins $1 million. The show has been on TV since 2001 and has many international versions. It's known for winning lots of Emmy Awards and has an average of 10 million viewers each season. A new season is coming in 2025.
title: The Amazing Race (American TV series)
